imagingbook.pub.fd

Class FourierDescriptorFromPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.fd.FourierDescriptor
      • imagingbook.pub.fd.FourierDescriptorFromPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class FourierDescriptorFromPolygon
extends FourierDescriptor
    Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are non-uniformly sampled.
    Version:
    2015/08/13

    • Constructor Detail

      • FourierDescriptorFromPolygon

        public FourierDescriptorFromPolygon(Point2D[] V,
                                    int Mp)
        Parameters:
        V - sequences of 2D points describing an arbitrary, closed polygon.
        Mp - the number of Fourier coefficient pairs (M = 2 * Mp + 1).

      • FourierDescriptorFromPolygon

        public FourierDescriptorFromPolygon(ij.gui.Roi roi,
                                    int Mp)
        Parameters:
        roi: - a region of interest (ImageJ), not necessarily a polyline.
        Mp: - the number of Fourier coefficient pairs (M = 2 * Mp + 1)
